Operators (fd_greens.main.operators)

class SecondQuantizedOperators(n_qubits: int, factor: Union[int, float] = - 1)[source]

Bases: object

A class to store the X and Y parts of the creation and annihilation operators.

Initializes a SecondQuantizedOperators object.

Parameters

  • n_qubits – The number of qubits in the creation and annihilation operators.

  • factor – A multiplication factor for simpler gate implementation.

transform(transform_func: Callable[[Union[qiskit.opflow.primitive_ops.pauli_sum_op.PauliSumOp, qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp]], Union[qiskit.opflow.primitive_ops.pauli_sum_op.PauliSumOp, qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp]]) → None[source]

Transforms the set of second quantized operators by Z2 symmetries.

get_pauli_dict() → Dict[int, Tuple[qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp, qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp]][source]

Returns a dictionary of the second quantized operators.

class ChargeOperators(n_qubits: int)[source]

Bases: object

A class to store U01 and U10 for calculating charge-charge response functions.

Initializes a ChargeOperators object.

Parameters

operators. (The number of qubits in the charge) –
